name: Princess of Magic
description:
You're a princess. Get ready to regain your throne!

Yes, your bad uncle has took over the throne after your father's death but the kingdom belongs to you (your uncle is really bad guy besides this)!

Fortunately, a good wizard had taught you how to use magic and that's the begining of your story!

Take a journey through many places and mazes full of monsters and go to the castle where you face to your uncle the bad sorcerer.
